titles.title: Driving Veterans Success Act
Driving Veterans Success Act
To amend the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act to establish a veterans business enterprises program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
Driving Veterans Success Act
This bill requires that at least 10% of the funds under specified infrastructure programs are expended through veteran-owned small businesses.
